text: Pranotosh Kumar Das is a Bangladeshi footballer who plays as a midfielder. He currently plays for Dhaka Abahani. He scored his first international goal against Bhutan during 2009 SAFF Championship. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1982 births Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Bangladeshi footballers Category:Bangladesh international footballers Category:Association football midfielders
title: Pranotosh Kumar Das
